trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur is hoping you are well-versed in crafting winterwear.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Garharlor.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the pleasant Pelupelu.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_SEQ_03<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Garharlor.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the pleasant Pelupelu)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_000<tab>A merchant caravan has been paying more frequent visits to Zirgorteh the Open-armed of late. Glad as we are to host them, I cannot help but fear for their health in these frigid climes.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>I'd like to craft them some warm garments to ward off the bitter winds, but I know little and less about crafting garb for smaller folk...

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>Might I ask you to design these vestments in my stead? Something that will keep any visitor from succumbing to the cold, no matter their size... An adjustable poncho, perhaps.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>Excellent news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your handcrafted ponchos have been the talk of Zirgorteh the Open-armed. In fact, I've received word that one of our merchant visitors wishes to purchase a few garments from you.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_006<tab>I do not mean to impose, but would you be so kind as to prepare a few more? Our guest would be most grateful for them.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_007<tab>Garharlor over there possesses a surplus of clothing material, so do not hesitate to make use of his stock.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_010<tab>Looking to design some cold-resistant garb for our guests, you say? Then you've come to the right place. To ensure there's enough to go around, I suggest you craft three sets.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_020<tab>If you could fashion up ponchos durable enough to withstand bone-chilling winds, yet lightweight enough for our smaller guests, why, that would be ideal! I've a wealth of materials at the ready, so if you need more, do feel free to ask.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_021<tab>If you could fashion up ponchos durable enough to withstand rough mountain roads, yet comfortable and lightweight enough for our smaller guests, why, that would be ideal! I've a wealth of materials at the ready, so if you need more, do feel free to ask.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_022<tab>If you could fashion up ponchos durable enough for proper insulation, yet lightweight enough for easy travel, why, that would be ideal! I've a wealth of materials at the ready, so if you need more, do feel free to ask.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_023<tab>When you've finished with those garments, you'd do well to make for Worlar's Echo and seek out our Pelupelu merchant friend.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_030<tab>You've enough materials, I hope? Good, good. If you do happen to run out, I'd be happy to provide more.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_GARHARLOR_000_040<tab>In need of extra materials? Well, we've no shortage of them! Here you are.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_CITIZENA05342_000_049<tab>Oh, dear... The mountain winds are as biting as ever. Hm? Can I help you, friend?

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_CITIZENA05342_000_050<tab>Ponchos for me and mine? Oh, how delightfully warm... And the size is adjustable, as well? A fine quality product indeed! I'm certain I could climb the mountain in comfort with this.
TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_CITIZENA05342_000_051<tab>It would be my pleasure to wear it. Thank you kindly for your hard work! Please do send my regards to Vuyargur as well.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_CITIZENA05342_000_055<tab>Flawless as ever, I see! My friends have scarcely stopped speaking of these ponchos since I presented them with theirs, you know. It's why I thought to buy them in bulk─to spread word of the wonderful work you're doing!

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_CITIZENA05342_000_056<tab>And with more in circulation, perhaps more merchants like myself will make the trek up the mountain...or so I hope! Now, then, I must be off, but mark my words: I'll be back!

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_060<tab>The ponchos were well received, were they? I'm pleased to hear it. There are many products we cannot procure from Worlar's Echo alone, so the more merchant visitors we have, the better.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_061<tab>As our work continues, I do not doubt the restoration will see the mountain flourish with guests. Perhaps it would be prudent to craft a surplus of ponchos for them in the future...

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_065<tab>Thank you for delivering the ponchos to our merchant friend, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. He and his fellows are a vital aspect of our restoration project.

TEXT_BANYOK107_05342_VUYARGUR_000_066<tab>The Hands of Zirgorteh will not be the only ones to benefit from their patronage. As our mountain flourishes with merchants and guests, I am certain that Worlar's Echo shall grow and prosper from it as well.
